title: Did a hotel owner in Switzerland ask Jewish guests to take a shower before using the pool?
subtitle: The news articles accurately describe the real marks published around a hotel in Urusa, Switzerland, which was widely condemned as anti-Semitic.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In August 2017, the owner of a hotel in Arusa, Switzerland, placed signs restricting Jewish guests, including their demand to shower before the use of the hotel pool.
